scripts.compile: for circuit in src/*.circom; do circom $circuit --r1cs --wasm --sym --c -o out/circuits; done
scripts.export:zkey: for circuit in out/circuits/*.r1cs; do snarkjs groth16 setup $circuit powersOfTau28_hez_final_15.ptau out/zkeys/$(basename -- $circuit .r1cs).zkey; done
scripts.export:verifier: for zkey in out/zkeys/*.zkey; do snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier $zkey out/verifiers/$(basename -- $zkey .zkey | perl -nE 'say ucfirst').sol; done
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run export:zkey && npm run export:verifier
